headline: Is It Time To Reconsider MarketAxess (MKTX) After A Multi Year Share Price Slide
summary: If you are wondering whether MarketAxess Holdings' current share price reflects its true value, you are not alone. This article is built to help you frame that question clearly. The stock last closed at US$169.23, with returns of a 1.4% decline over 7 days, a 5.2% decline over 30 days, a 5.2% decline year to date, a 21.2% decline over 1 year, a 49.8% decline over 3 years, and a 68.6% decline over 5 years, which may change how investors think about its potential and its risks. Recent coverage...
